zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[短期下行趋势显现]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在美元交易对中表现出短期下行趋势。最新价格为11.5997美元，较24小时前下跌4.29%。在高点12.1206美元与低点11.4138美元之间的波动表明市场情绪趋于谨慎，投资者应关注未来的价格动向，以把握入场时机。

技术指标方面，MACD值为-0.0189，显示出卖方力量略占优势，尽管信号线数据缺失，但整体趋势偏向弱势。同时，20日简单移动平均线（SMA）为11.84223美元，当前价格已低于该均线，进一步确认短期内的下行压力。RSI指标缺失，但通常情况下，若RSI接近30，则可能预示超卖状态。

在支撑和阻力位方面，11.4138美元构成了近期的支撑位，如果价格跌破该水平，可能会引发更大的卖盘压力。上方阻力位则在11.84223美元附近，若能站稳此处将有助于恢复上涨趋势。建议投资者在当前价格区间内谨慎操作，可考虑在支撑位附近逐步建仓，同时密切关注市场情绪变化。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently experiencing a downward trend, evident from the latest price of 11.5997, which has seen a 24-hour change of -4.29%. The recent high of 12.1206 and low of 11.4138 indicate a consolidation phase, with price action remaining confined within this range. The bearish movement suggests that sellers are gaining control, and if this trend continues, the price may test the support level around 11.4138, which could act as a critical threshold for further declines.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of a current RSI value limits the ability to assess overbought or oversold conditions. However, the MACD is currently negative at -0.0189, indicating bearish momentum. A lack of a signal line further complicates the interpretation, suggesting that traders should exercise caution. Monitoring the MACD for potential crossovers may provide insights into a reversal or continuation of the current trend.

The SMA(20) at 11.84223 serves as a short-term resistance level. A sustained move above this average could indicate a potential recovery towards the recent high of 12.1206. Conversely, if the price breaks below the support at 11.4138, it may trigger further selling pressure, leading to deeper corrections. Traders should keep an eye on these levels, as they will be critical for determining the next direction of AVAX.

For traders considering entry or exit points, a cautious approach is advisable. A bounce off the support level at 11.4138 could present a buying opportunity, especially if accompanied by bullish momentum indicators. On the other hand, if the price slips below this support, a short position may be warranted, targeting lower support levels. Keeping abreast of market sentiment and broader cryptocurrency trends will also be crucial in making informed trading decisions.
